hero.title: TanyaGPT
hero.subtitle: Asisten AI Instan Anda: Dapatkan Jawaban dan Bantuan Seketika.
hero.description: Mulai Chat Langsung dari Telegram, Instagram, atau WhatsApp – Tanpa Perlu Download Aplikasi.

showcase.title: Lihat TanyaGPT Beraksi
showcase.subtitle: Temukan bagaimana TanyaGPT membantu pengguna dalam tugas sehari-hari

imageAnalysis.title: Analisis Gambar Instan
imageAnalysis.description: Kirim gambar apapun dan dapatkan penjelasan langsung di WhatsApp. Dari identifikasi objek hingga analisis dokumen.
imageAnalysis.alt2: Demo analisis gambar lanjutan di WhatsApp

shopping.title: Asisten Belanja Pintar
shopping.description: Belanja di Instagram? TanyaGPT membantu membandingkan produk, mengecek review, dan merekomendasikan pilihan terbaik untuk Anda.

news.title: Analisis Berita Politik
news.description: Tetap update dengan berita politik terkini langsung dari sumber terpercaya. TanyaGPT membantu menganalisis dan merangkum informasi untuk menghindari hoaks.
news.alt1: Demo analisis berita politik di Telegram
news.alt2: Demo analisis lanjutan berita politik di Telegram

features.title: Fitur Unggulan
features.subtitle: Asisten AI Anda dilengkapi kemampuan untuk membantu Anda berhasil

chat.title: Selalu Siap 24/7
chat.description: Dapatkan bantuan instan kapan saja dengan berbagai topik. Asisten AI Anda siap saat Anda membutuhkan.

versatile.title: Asisten Serba Bisa
versatile.description: Dari menulis email hingga membantu PR, dapatkan bantuan ahli untuk tugas dan tantangan sehari-hari Anda.

easyToUse.title: Mudah Digunakan
easyToUse.description: Cukup chat seperti chatting dengan teman. Tidak perlu aplikasi tambahan, cukup gunakan Telegram atau WhatsApp.

imageAnalysis.title: Analisis Gambar
imageAnalysis.description: Kirim gambar dan TanyaGPT akan membantu menganalisis, menjelaskan, atau menjawab pertanyaan tentang gambar tersebut.

webSearch.title: Penelusuran Web
webSearch.description: TanyaGPT dapat mencari informasi terkini di internet untuk memberikan jawaban yang akurat dan up-to-date.

youtubeAnalysis.title: Analisis Video YouTube
youtubeAnalysis.description: Kirim link YouTube dan TanyaGPT akan membantu merangkum atau menjawab pertanyaan berdasarkan konten video.

shopping.title: Asisten Belanja
shopping.description: Belanja di Tokopedia atau Shopee dengan lebih aman dan hemat. TanyaGPT membantu membandingkan harga dan mengecek review penjual.

advancedUsage.title: Penggunaan Lanjutan
advancedUsage.subtitle: Optimalkan pengalaman Anda dengan perintah khusus

aiModel.title: Ganti Model AI
aiModel.description: Pilih model AI yang ingin Anda gunakan:

gpt4.name: openai/gpt-4o-mini
gpt4.description: Model serba bisa yang cepat untuk berbagai kebutuhan

gemini.name: google/gemini-flash-1.5-8b
gemini.description: Cocok untuk percakapan yang sangat panjang

deepseek.name: deepseek/deepseek-chat
deepseek.description: Asisten pintar, tapi mungkin ada kesulitan browsing web

clear.title: Bersihkan Riwayat
clear.description: Hapus riwayat percakapan untuk memulai topik baru dengan fokus yang segar.

admin.title: Bantuan Admin
admin.description: Hubungkan dengan admin untuk bantuan jika mengalami error atau ada pertanyaan tentang layanan

pricing.title: Harga
pricing.subtitle: Akses TanyaGPT dengan mudah dan terjangkau

limitations.messages: Dibatasi jumlah pesan untuk penggunaan yang wajar

pricing.note: Kok bisa gratis? Ini adalah exploration project dari author. Layanan produk dapat dihentikan atau dibatasi sewaktu-waktu.

roadmap.title: Fitur Mendatang
roadmap.subtitle: Kami terus mengembangkan TanyaGPT untuk memberikan pengalaman yang lebih baik

memory.title: Memori Jangka Panjang
memory.description: Asisten Anda akan mengingat preferensi dan informasi tentang Anda, memberikan interaksi yang lebih personal di setiap sesi chat.

email.title: Akses Email
email.description: Baca dan kelola email penting, tagihan, dan komunikasi lainnya dengan bantuan asisten Anda.

voiceNote.title: Voice Note
voiceNote.description: Kirim pesan suara saat Anda sedang tidak ingin mengetik, untuk pengalaman chat yang lebih natural.

notifications.title: Notifikasi Proaktif
notifications.description: Asisten Anda akan mengingatkan hal-hal penting dan memberikan informasi yang relevan secara proaktif.

socialMedia.title: Akses Media Sosial
socialMedia.description: Ingin tetap update tentang keluarga dan teman tanpa terdistraksi dan doom scrolling? TanyaGPT akan membantu merangkum informasi penting untuk Anda.

calendar.title: Manajemen Jadwal
calendar.description: Integrasi dengan kalender untuk membantu mengatur jadwal meeting, reminder, dan to-do list dengan lebih efisien.

documents.title: Asisten Dokumen
documents.description: Upload dan edit dokumen langsung dari chat. TanyaGPT akan membantu menulis, mengedit, dan memformat dokumen Anda.

cta.question1: Ingin fitur favorit Anda segera tersedia?
cta.question2: Atau punya ide fitur lain yang belum ada di roadmap?

andi.text: TanyaGPT sangat membantu saya dalam pekerjaan sehari-hari. Responsnya cepat dan akurat!
andi.author: Andi S.

budi.text: Saya suka bagaimana TanyaGPT bisa membantu menganalisis gambar dan video. Fitur yang sangat berguna!
budi.author: Budi R.

clara.text: Interface yang simpel dan mudah digunakan. Recommended banget buat yang butuh asisten AI!
clara.author: Clara W.

hero.title: TanyaGPT
hero.subtitle: Your Instant AI Assistant: Get Answers and Help Instantly.
hero.description: Start Chatting Directly from Telegram, Instagram, or WhatsApp – No Downloads Needed.

showcase.title: Real-World Help: See TanyaGPT in Action
showcase.subtitle: Discover how TanyaGPT assists users in their daily tasks

imageAnalysis.title: Analyze Images Instantly
imageAnalysis.description: Send any image and TanyaGPT will help analyze, explain, or answer questions about it.
imageAnalysis.alt1: Demo of image analysis on WhatsApp
imageAnalysis.alt2: Demo of advanced image analysis on WhatsApp

shopping.title: Smart Shopping Assistant
shopping.description: Want something? TanyaGPT helps compare products, check reviews, and recommend the best options for your needs.
shopping.alt1: Demo of shopping assistant on Instagram
shopping.alt2: Demo of product analysis on Instagram

news.title: Political News Analysis
news.description: Stay updated with the latest political news directly from trusted sources. TanyaGPT helps analyze and summarize information to avoid hoaxes.
news.alt1: Demo of political news analysis on Telegram
news.alt2: Demo of advanced political news analysis on Telegram

features.title: Powerful Features
features.subtitle: Your AI assistant comes packed with capabilities to help you succeed

chat.title: Always Available
chat.description: Get instant help 24/7 with any topic or question. Your AI companion is ready when you are.

versatile.title: Versatile Assistant
versatile.description: From writing emails to homework help, get expert assistance with your daily tasks and challenges.

easyToUse.title: Easy to Use
easyToUse.description: Just chat like you're chatting with a friend. No additional apps needed, just use Telegram or WhatsApp.

imageAnalysis.title: Image Analysis
imageAnalysis.description: Send any image and TanyaGPT will help analyze, explain, or answer questions about it.

webSearch.title: Web Search
webSearch.description: TanyaGPT can search for current information on the internet to provide accurate and up-to-date answers.

youtubeAnalysis.title: YouTube Video Analysis
youtubeAnalysis.description: Send a YouTube link and TanyaGPT will help summarize or answer questions based on the video content.

shopping.title: Shopping Assistant
shopping.description: Shop on Tokopedia or Shopee more safely and economically. TanyaGPT helps compare prices and check seller reviews.

advancedUsage.title: Advanced Usage
advancedUsage.subtitle: Optimize your experience with special commands

aiModel.title: Change AI Model
aiModel.description: Choose which AI model you want to use:

gpt4.name: openai/gpt-4o-mini
gpt4.description: Fast versatile model for various needs

deepseek.name: deepseek/deepseek-chat
deepseek.description: Smart assistant, but may have difficulty browsing the web

clear.title: Clear History
clear.description: Clear conversation history to start a new topic with fresh focus.

admin.title: Admin Support
admin.description: Connect with admin for help if you experience errors or have questions about the service

pricing.title: Pricing
pricing.subtitle: Access TanyaGPT easily and affordably

limitations.pricing: Pricing may change at any time

pricing.note: Why is it free? This is an exploration project from the author. The service may be discontinued or limited at any time.

roadmap.title: Upcoming Features
roadmap.subtitle: We're continuously developing TanyaGPT to provide a better experience

memory.title: Long-term Memory
memory.description: Your assistant will remember preferences and information about you, providing more personal interactions in every chat session.

email.title: Email Access
email.description: Read and manage important emails, bills, and other communications with the help of your assistant.

voiceNote.title: Voice Notes
voiceNote.description: Send voice messages when you don't feel like typing, for a more natural chat experience.

notifications.title: Proactive Notifications
notifications.description: Your assistant will remind you of important things and proactively provide relevant information.

socialMedia.title: Social Media Access
socialMedia.description: Want to stay updated about family and friends without distraction and doom scrolling? TanyaGPT will help summarize important information for you.

calendar.title: Schedule Management
calendar.description: Calendar integration to help manage meeting schedules, reminders, and to-do lists more efficiently.

documents.title: Document Assistant
documents.description: Upload and edit documents directly from chat. TanyaGPT will help write, edit, and format your documents.

cta.question1: Want your favorite feature to be available soon?
cta.question2: Or have another feature idea not in the roadmap?

andi.text: TanyaGPT has been very helpful in my daily work. The responses are quick and accurate!
andi.author: Andy S.

budi.text: I love how TanyaGPT can help analyze images and videos. Such a useful feature!
budi.author: Bob R.

clara.text: Simple and easy-to-use interface. Highly recommended for anyone who needs an AI assistant!
clara.author: Claire W.
